# conjur_secret (Data Source)

Secret from Conjur Vault

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "conjur_secret" "cloud_dbpass" {
  name = data/test/var-name
}
```

## Schema

- `name` (String) name (path) of the secret

- `version` (String) version of the secret
